title: 2024 Esplanade Octoburst performance
description: Participated as a member of the Frontier Primary School choir for a public performance at the Esplanade Octoburst festival.

title: 2024 National Day Performance at Frontier CC
description: Performed as part of the school choir during Singapore's National Day celebrations at Frontier Community Centre.

title: P3 LLP DANCEFRONT Programme
description: Completed the Ethnic Dance Programme conducted by En Avant Arts as part of the school's Learning for Life Programme.

title: Edusave Certificate of Academic Achievement - Primary 4
description: Awarded for achieving good academic performance and demonstrating good conduct during the Primary 4 school year.

title: Edusave Certificate of Academic Achievement - Primary 5
description: Awarded for achieving good academic performance and demonstrating good conduct during the Primary 5 school year.

title: CCC-CDC Education Merit Award - Primary 4
description: Awarded by the People's Association and South West Community Development Council for academic excellence in Primary 4.

title: Singapore Primary Science Olympiad 2024
description: Participated in the nationwide Science Olympiad organized by NUS High School of Mathematics and Science.

title: 华文大比拼 2024
description: Participated in the 11th National Chinese Challenge (Primary School category), a nationwide Chinese language competition.

title: The Buddy Reading Programme 2023
description: Performed the role of a P4 Buddy Reader, helping P2 students with their reading skills during Term 2.

title: SwimSafer Stage 2 Award
description: Successfully completed all the swimming, water safety and survival skills to fulfill the requirements of SWIMSAFER 2.0 STAGE 2.

title: SwimSafer Stage 3 Award
description: Successfully completed all the swimming, water safety and survival skills to fulfill the requirements of SWIMSAFER 2.0 STAGE 3.

title: Class eLF - Group Leader (Chinese)
description: Served as a Group Leader for Chinese class in Semester 2, fulfilling leadership responsibilities as outlined in the Class eLF Contract.

title: Class eLF - Acad Leader
description: Served as an Academic Leader in class P 3-4, helping peers with academic matters as outlined in the Class eLF Contract.

title: Class eLF - Welfare Leader
description: Served as a Welfare Leader in Semester 2, attending to classmates' welfare needs as outlined in the Class eLF Contract.

title: Class eLF - Group Leader
description: Served as a Group Leader in Semester 2, managing group activities and responsibilities as outlined in the Class eLF Contract.
